====================================
    SPRITE SHEET SLICER
    by Miisan
====================================


HOW TO USE:
-----------
1. Double-click spritesheet_slicer.exe to run
2. Click "Browse" to select your spritesheet image
3. Click "Load Image"
4. Set your sprite dimensions (width/height)
5. Click sprites to select/deselect them (green = selected)
6. Right-click sprites to give them custom names
7. Click "Extract Selected Sprites" to save!

FEATURES:
---------
- Visual grid overlay
- Mouse wheel to zoom in/out
- Click to select individual sprites
- Right-click to rename sprites
- Dark theme optimized for long sessions

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:
--------------------
- Windows XP or later
- No installation needed!

SUPPORTED FORMATS:
------------------
Input: PNG, JPG, JPEG, BMP, TGA
Output: PNG

====================================
Program by Miisan
====================================
